Class NightClubMgmtApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • NightClubMgmtApp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class NightClubMgmtApp
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    NightClubMgmtApp - this class contains the main. its job is to control the first user interaction with the program(the main program window); it extends JFrame and iniitializes the neccessary gui components for the frame [JComboBox- the entity choices, ArrayList- the array list of the clubbers] this class will also be responsible for reading and writing the clubbers from and into the file via the loadClubbersDBFromFile() and writeClubbersDBtoFile() methods.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • clubbers

        private static java.util.ArrayList<ClubAbstractEntity> clubbers
        clubbers - The ArrayList of the clubbers

    • Constructor Detail

      • NightClubMgmtApp

        public NightClubMgmtApp()
        empty constructor - will initialize the clubbers array afterward it will load the clubbers from the file via loadClubbersDBFromFile() method. It will then create a JPanel container and add new JButton's to it ["add"- creates a new entity using createEntity(int), "search"- uses manipulateDB()], in this proccess it will also wire an "anonymous ActionListener" handler to the buttons that tell it what to do when it is pressed. then it will initialize the entity choices combobox. In the end it takes care of the rest of the gui initializaton needed for this window.

    • Method Detail

      • wireHandlers

        private void wireHandlers(javax.swing.JButton search,
                          javax.swing.JButton add,
                          javax.swing.JComboBox<java.lang.String> entityChoices)
        This private method wires all the handlers to their gui components using anonymous listeners: the add (invokes createEntity(int)) and search (invokes manipulateDB()) buttons and the window itself (using WindowAdapter, invokes writeClubbersDBtoFile()).
        Parameters:
        search - The "search" button.
        add - The "add" button.
        entityChoices - The combo box with the choices to wire to the "add" button.

      • existsValidate

        public static boolean existsValidate(java.lang.String keyName,
                                     java.lang.String key,
                                     ClubAbstractEntity newClubber)
        This public static method is used to validate the existance of an entitys id/studentid/personalnum using the existing implemented abstract method ClubAbstractEntity.match(java.lang.String) of each inheriter of @{link ClubAbstractEntity} [Person.match(java.lang.String),Student.match(java.lang.String),Soldier.match(java.lang.String)]
        Parameters:
        keyName - The key name to be concatinated to the error message string
        key - a key to match by.
        newClubber - a new clubber to skip his match so we find another one except his (also prevents StringIndexOutOfBoundsException that String.substring(int) throws - occures when trying to match studentID to the new empty entity that we are adding)
        Returns:
        true if validation went successfully, false otherwise.

      • findClubber

        private ClubAbstractEntity findClubber(java.lang.String key)
        This method is used to find a clubber by a key given to it it uses each clubbers ClubAbstractEntity.match(java.lang.String) method.
        Parameters:
        key - - A String given to it to check by
        Returns:
        The clubber itself, if was found. otherwise returns null

      • createEntity

        private ClubAbstractEntity createEntity(int idx)
        Private mehtod used to create a new entity.
        Parameters:
        idx - The index that was given by the user choice in the combobox.
        Returns:
        A new entity based on the index that was given to it, if failed returns null.

      • manipulateDB

        private void manipulateDB()
        manipulateDB - used to control the searching mechanism. it asks the user of an id and looks for it inside the clubbers array using the findClubber(java.lang.String) method that uses each clubbers match function [Person.match(java.lang.String), Student.match(java.lang.String), Soldier.match(java.lang.String)] polymorphicly

      • loadClubbersDBFromFile

        private void loadClubbersDBFromFile()
        Loads the clubbers from file via ObjectInputStream and FileInputStream, will cast the readen object to arraylist of ClubAbstractEntity. Afterwards it will search for empty clubbers via findClubber(java.lang.String) method and deletes them (this can happen by mistake when closing the main window while adding a new entity (or several at once)). Notice that it throws FileNotFoundException and ClassNotFoundException

      • writeClubbersDBtoFile

        private void writeClubbersDBtoFile()
        Writes the clubbers arraylist to file using ObjectOutputStream and FileOutputStream. Notice that it could throw a FileNotFoundException

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        main function simply creates a new NightClubMgmtApp to get the application start running.
        Parameters:
        args -
